leadingComments.value:
*
 * this source come from www - https://www.cnblogs.com/dearxinli/p/7657512.html
/**
 * UTF-8UTF-16
 * UTF-8  Unicode 
 * 
 * 000000 - 00007F(128)      0zzzzzzz(00-7F)                             
 * 000080 - 0007FF(1920)     110yyyyy(C0-DF) 10zzzzzz(80-BF)             
 * 000800 - 00D7FF 
   00E000 - 00FFFF(61440)    1110xxxx(E0-EF) 10yyyyyy 10zzzzzz           
  * 010000 - 10FFFF(1048576)  11110www(F0-F7) 10xxxxxx 10yyyyyy 10zzzzzz  
  * 
  * : Unicode D800-DFFF 
  * {@link http://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTF-8}
  * 
  * UTF-16  65535 
  * 000000 - 00FFFF  
  * 010000 - 10FFFF  
  * 
  * {@link http://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTF-16}
  * @param  {String} str 
  * @param  {String} charset utf-8, utf-16
  * @return {Number}

*
 * this source come from www - https://www.cnblogs.com/dearxinli/p/7657512.html
